source_sentence: 佛說大集會正法經卷第二
translation: Foshuo dajihui zhengfa jing, vol. 2

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝奉大夫試鴻臚
translation: Xitian zhuan jing sanzang朝奉大夫試鴻

source_sentence: 卿傳法大師臣施護奉　詔譯
translation: You transmitted the translation of the imperial edict to the Dharma Master Shi Hu Feng, a minister of the emperor.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊化諸尼乾陀眾已，即以方便善巧善說法，心住三摩呬多，舒金色臂經七晝夜，
translation: At that time the World-honored One, having thus transformed the Nirgrantha [monks], skillfully and skillfully taught them the Dharma by means of skillful means, remained in absorption for seven days and nights, extending his golden-colored arm.

source_sentence: 乃至普勇菩薩遊十方世界廣作佛事已，來還此土。
translation: After traveling to the worlds in the ten directions and performing buddha-works extensively, the Bodhisattva Samantabhadra returned to this land.

source_sentence: 是時，普勇菩薩從彼蓮華上佛剎，譬如力士屈伸臂頃，到於佛前，禮佛足已，
translation: At that moment, the enlightening being Universal Courage came from the buddha-stage on top of the lotus blossoms to this buddha-stage, just as if a strong man were to come before the Buddha with his arms extended and bow at his feet.

source_sentence: 右繞三匝，住立一面。
translation: He circumambulated the Buddha three times to his right and remained standing at one side.

source_sentence: 是時，世尊出三摩呬多已，普勇菩薩前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After the Bhagavān had emerged from samādhi, the Bodhisattva Samantabhadra went to the Buddha and said, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我承佛旨往彼十方世界，以自神通力，過九十九千俱胝佛剎，以佛神通力，
translation: In accordance with the Buddha’s instructions, I went to all those buddha-lands in the ten directions by my own supernatural power and passed through ninety-nine thousand buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 又過百千俱胝佛剎，乃至最後到下方蓮華上世界。
translation: It also goes beyond the hundreds of thousands of koṭis of buddha bases up to the final point downward in the lotus-flower world above.

source_sentence: 其中過八千俱胝佛剎，見彼諸佛現大神通；
translation: Among them, more than eight thousand buddha-lands in the ten directions saw those buddhas manifest great mystic powers.

source_sentence: 又過九十二千俱胝佛剎，見諸如來現為眾生說深妙法。
translation: More than ninety-two thousand koṭis of buddha bases, he saw the Tathāgatas presently expound the profound and marvelous Dharma for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 又過八十千俱胝佛剎，於一時中，見八十千俱胝如來、應供、正等正覺出現於世，
translation: And at the same time, past eighty-thousand buddha-samādhis, he saw in a single instant eighty-thousand buddha-samādhis of buddhas appearing in the world.

source_sentence: 我時於彼一一佛前恭敬供養。
translation: At the time, I honored and offered support to each of those buddhas.

source_sentence: 又過三十九俱胝佛剎，見三十九千俱胝菩薩摩訶薩同時出現，皆證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，
translation: “Furthermore, past the buddha-lands of thirty-nine thousand koṭis of enlightening beings, they all attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 我即於彼初成道者，如是等如來、應供、正等正覺所，一一恭敬禮拜供養已，
translation: I honor, venerate, venerate, and make offerings to each of those buddhas who have just attained enlightenment.

source_sentence: 即復以自神通力隱身不現。
translation: Again, he uses his own supernormal powers to hide himself and not show up.

source_sentence: 又過六十俱胝佛剎，見諸如來一一恭敬。
translation: More than sixty koṭis of buddha-dhātus were also present, and they saw the various tathāgatas venerate them one by one.

source_sentence: 又過百俱胝佛剎，見彼諸佛入般涅槃，我時還復一一於彼恭敬供養。
translation: When I saw those buddhas enter parinirvāṇa in a hundred koṭis of buddha-stage buddha-lands, I again venerated and offered support to each one of them.

source_sentence: 從是復過九十五佛剎，知彼如來皆久滅度，所有正法將欲滅壞。
translation: From this, he goes beyond the ninety-five buddha bases and knows that those tathāgatas have all long since ceased, and all the right teachings they have are about to cease.

source_sentence: 我於是時竊自思惟：『此佛正法將欲滅壞、深為大苦。』
translation: At the time, I thought to myself, 'This is the right teaching of the Buddha that's about to cease and disintegrate, which is profoundly painful.'

source_sentence: 作是念已，生大悲愍。
translation: After he had this thought, he gave rise to great compassion.

source_sentence: 是時復有欲色界天人、龍神、夜叉等皆大憂惱。
translation: At the time, there were also gods, humans, dragons, spirits, and yakṣas in the form realm of desire who were greatly distressed.

source_sentence: 又見其中有一佛剎，彼佛正法久已滅盡，劫火熾然從四面起，乃至大地、須彌山王、大海、江河、一切樹木，
translation: He also saw a buddha-land there, where the true teaching of that buddha had long since been extinguished. The fires of the kalpa blazed and rose from all four directions, reaching as far as the earth, the polar mountain, the great ocean, the rivers, and all the trees in the forests on Mount Sumeru.

source_sentence: 皆悉已焚，無所依止，唯一空界，蕩然無際。
translation: All of them have been burned, and there's nothing to rely on, except for the single realm of space, which is vast and limitless.

source_sentence: 「過是剎已即到下方，於一世界，見百千俱胝如來各坐寶蓮華座，又見四方亦復如是，
translation: “Furthermore, as soon as he had passed that buddha-land, he went down to one world and saw hundreds of thousands of koṭis of buddhas each seated on jeweled lotus thrones in the four directions.

source_sentence: 彼等諸佛各各現為一切眾生說法化度。
translation: Each of those buddhas presently teaches the Dharma for all sentient beings and transforms them.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我既到彼佛剎已，即作是念：『今此佛剎名字何等？』
translation: After arriving at that buddha-stage, I thought, 'What's the name of this buddha-stage now?'

source_sentence: 彼有一佛而告我言：『善男子！
translation: There was a buddha there who told me, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 今此佛剎名蓮華上。』
translation: Now, this buddha-stage is called the lotus flower on top of the lotus.'

source_sentence: 我時即問：『化主世尊，其名若何？』
translation: I then asked, 'World-honored One, what's the name of the master of transformation?'

source_sentence: 彼佛答言：『名蓮華藏如來、應供、正等正覺。』
translation: The Buddha answered, 'He's called the Lotus Treasury Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Enlightened.'

source_sentence: 我於爾時，普皆作禮，一心恭敬，作是白言：『我今見此百千俱胝那庾多佛，
translation: At that time I paid homage to these hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of buddha images. With respect and veneration, I said:

source_sentence: 一一皆處寶蓮華座，而復不知何者即名蓮華藏佛，唯願示我化主世尊。』
translation: Each one of them is seated on a jeweled lotus throne, but they don't know which one is called the lotus-treasury buddha, so please show me the Bhagavān, the master of transformation.'

source_sentence: 時，彼蓮華藏如來於多佛中發是告言：『善男子！
translation: The Lotus-Store Tathāgata then addressed the many buddhas, saying, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 蓮華藏佛即我身是。』
translation: The lotus-treasury buddha is the self.'

source_sentence: 作是言已，彼諸佛等而各忽然隱如來身、現菩薩相。
translation: After they said this, each of those buddhas suddenly hid the Tathāgata's body and showed bodhisattva forms.

source_sentence: 我當是時唯見化主蓮華藏如來，一佛世尊居大眾中，相好威神，無能勝者。
translation: At the time, I saw only the transformation lord, the Lotus Treasury Tathāgata, a world-honored one of the buddhas who lived among the assembled people and whose appearance was so beautiful and powerful that none could surpass it.

source_sentence: 即以頭面，作禮恭敬。
translation: He then bowed his head and face in respect.

source_sentence: 是時，彼佛指蓮華座而謂我言：『善男子！
translation: The Buddha then pointed to the lotus throne and said to me, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 可就此座。』
translation: You can stay here at this seat.'

source_sentence: 「我於爾時既就座已，即見彼佛，於其左右復有無量寶蓮華座，殊妙莊嚴甚為希有，
translation: “Thereupon, as soon as I had taken my seat on that throne, I saw the buddha. To my left and right there was also a lotus-seat of infinite jewels, beautifully arrayed and extremely rare.

source_sentence: 忽作是念：『如是等座云何皆空無能登者？』
translation: Suddenly, he thought, 'How are all these seats empty without someone who can ascend them?'

source_sentence: 乃問彼佛。
translation: He then asked the Buddha.

source_sentence: 而答我言：『善男子！
translation: He answered me, saying, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 如此等座，皆是不可思議上妙功德之所建立，非少善根所能成就，若人於佛法分有未入者，
translation: Such seats are all built by inconceivable, supremely marvelous virtue and cannot be accomplished by anyone with a small amount of good roots. Those who have not yet entered the buddha-dharma will never do so.

source_sentence: 尚不能見，況復能登？』
translation: I still can't see it, so how could I ascend it?'

source_sentence: 我時又問世尊：『當種何善根，於此等座而乃得昇？』
translation: I then asked the Bhagavān again, 'What good roots will you cultivate to attain ascendancy on this seat?'

source_sentence: 彼佛答言：『善男子！
translation: The Buddha answered, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 若有人能於此大集會正法暫聽受者，以是善根得昇此座，何況更能書寫、讀誦、常所修習。
translation: If someone can listen to and accept the right teaching of this great assembly for a moment, they'll ascend this seat because of their good roots, so why wouldn't they be able to write, recite, and always cultivate it?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝於過去無量劫來，已能受持如是大集會正法，若不以是善根力故，我此佛剎亦未能到，
translation: For innumerable past ages you have been able to receive and hold such a great assembly of the true teaching. If you do not, by the power of these roots of goodness, I cannot reach this buddha-land either.

source_sentence: 況復得見此座而欲昇耶？』
translation: How could he see this seat and want to ascend it?'

source_sentence: 彼佛作是言已，我即白言：『如是如是！
translation: After that Buddha said this, I said, 'So it is, so it is!'

source_sentence: 世尊。』
translation: Bhagavān.'

source_sentence: 我復又問彼佛：『此大集會正法有幾所功德，而能生諸善法？』
translation: Again, I asked that Buddha, 'How much merit does this great assembly of the right teaching have that produces good qualities?'

source_sentence: 「爾時，彼蓮華藏如來，亦放希有淨妙光明，普照佛會已而謂我言：『善男子！
translation: At the time, that lotus-treasury tathāgata also radiated a rare, pure and marvelous ray of light, illuminated the Buddha's assembly, and said to me, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 汝大菩薩得大勢力智慧無礙，能於一切諸佛剎土，為諸眾生稱揚佛事，
translation: You great enlightening beings attain great power and unhindered knowledge, able to extol the buddha-work for sentient beings in all buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 汝先已曾問彼娑婆世界釋迦如來，今以是法還復問我，我當為汝亦分別說，
譬如有人於四大洲置以胡麻悉皆充滿，如是相合都為一聚，是為多不？』
translation: Suppose a person places sesame on the four major continents and fills them all up, and thus they are combined into one lump, is that many?'

source_sentence: 我即答言：『甚多。
translation: I then answered, 'Very many.

source_sentence: 世尊！』
translation: Bhagavān!'

source_sentence: 時彼佛言：『假使有人，取一胡麻置於他處，如是從一至一欲知其數。
translation: The Buddha then said, 'Suppose someone takes one sesame and puts it elsewhere, and thus they want to know the number of sesame seeds from one to one.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 於汝意云何？
translation: What do you think?

source_sentence: 是人可能知其數不？』
translation: Is that person able to know their number?'

source_sentence: 我復答言：『不也。
translation: Again, I replied, 'No.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是人雖竭其力經於多劫，終不能知如是數量。』
translation: Even though this person has exhausted their power for many eons, they still can't know the number of such people.'

source_sentence: 彼佛又言：『善男子！
translation: The Buddha also said, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 此大集會正法，所有福聚亦復如是，非算數譬喻之所能知，正使如上所說數量，
translation: So it is with this great assembly of the true teaching, which consists of accumulations of merit that cannot be known by calculation or metaphor. The precise cause is as has been said above:

source_sentence: 一一皆是諸佛如來，復經俱胝那庾多劫稱量讚歎此大正法，聽受功德亦不能盡，
translation: Each and every one of them were buddha-tathāgatas. For billions of eons they extolled this great doctrine with praise, and even after listening to their recitation the virtues could not be exhausted.

source_sentence: 何況有人書寫讀誦，其福甚多。』
translation: How could it be that someone who writes, reads, and recites them will have so much merit?'

source_sentence: 「我復又問：『若書寫者得幾所福？
translation: Again, I asked, 'How much merit does a writer attain?'

source_sentence: 願佛略說。』
translation: May the Buddha explain it briefly.'

source_sentence: 時，彼佛言：『善男子！
translation: The Buddha then said, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 譬如三千大千世界所有草木叢林，盡取斷為一指節量，一一量數皆是轉輪聖王；
translation: It is as if all the grasses, trees, shrubs, and forests of the great manifold cosmos in the universe consisting of a trichiliocosm were to be counted by the measure of a knuckle.

source_sentence: 又如三千大千世界，所有土石盡碎微塵，一一塵數皆是轉輪聖王，如是等所有福聚，
translation: “Furthermore, just as in the great manifold cosmos consisting of a thousand worlds all the dirt and stones there are completely broken into minute particles, each particle being equal to the number of wheel-turning sage kings, so is the accumulation of merit such as this.

source_sentence: 若算師等欲知其數，汝謂是人知其數不？』
translation: If you arithmetic teachers and others want to know the number, do you say that person knows the number?'

source_sentence: 我時答言：『不也。
translation: I then replied, 'No.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是福聚，雖算師等亦不能知。』
translation: Such is the accumulation of merit, which even though it's not known by a calculating teacher or so.'

source_sentence: 彼佛又言：『若有書寫此大集會正法者，所獲福聚亦復如是，復多於彼，
translation: Again, the Buddha said: If there is anyone who writes this Mahasamyukta Abhidharma, the accumulation of merit obtained will be exactly like this, even greater than theirs.

source_sentence: 算數譬喻所不能知。
translation: They can't be known by calculating metaphors or metaphors.

source_sentence: 但能於此正法書寫一字，是人所獲福聚已勝於彼；
translation: But if one could write a single word of this true doctrine, that person’s accumulation of merit would be superior to theirs.

source_sentence: 況復有人，於此正法受持一四句偈，是人功德不可稱計，一切寶藏常所出現，
translation: “Furthermore, if someone were to memorize a single four-line verse on this true teaching, the merit of that person’s virtue would be incalculable. It would always appear in all treasuries of jewels.

source_sentence: 一切煩惱皆得銷滅，一切法炬光明普照，一切天魔無能勝者，一切菩薩盡所觀察一切法門皆悉能入。』
translation: All afflictions are completely extinguished, the light of all the torches of the Dharma universally illuminates, and there's nothing that gods and Māra can overcome, and all the teachings observed by all bodhisattvas can enter them.'

source_sentence: 彼佛作是說已，我即白言：『世尊！
translation: After that Buddha spoke these words, I said, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有眾生，能於如是大集會正法修正行者，乃得名為最上梵行，而彼梵行即如來行，
translation: If there are any sentient beings who can cultivate practice in such a great assembly of the true teaching, they will be called the supreme religious practice, whereas that religious practice is the practice of the enlightened.

source_sentence: 若勤修習無間斷者，是人即得百佛如來於晝夜中常現在前，若見如來即入佛剎，
translation: If someone diligently cultivates it without interruption, they'll attain the hundreds of buddha-tathāgatas who are always present day and night, and if they see the Tathāgata, they'll enter the Buddha's buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 入佛剎已，一切法藏皆能了知。』
translation: After entering a buddha-stage, he'll be able to comprehend all the stores of the Dharma.'

source_sentence: 「我於爾時作是言已，彼蓮華藏佛又告我言：『善男子！
translation: After I said this, that lotus-treasury Buddha again addressed me, saying, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 諸佛如來時一出現，若得遇者，是亦為難，說此正法，復甚為難，得聞持者，
translation: It is also very difficult to encounter buddha-tathāgatas. To preach the true-dharma for someone who hears and retains it [as a scripture] would be very difficult.

source_sentence: 轉復甚難。
translation: Again, it's very difficult to change.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 若有聞此正法者，是人於六十萬六千八十劫中，或得宿命智，或為轉輪王、帝釋、淨光天、大梵世主等，
translation: If someone hears this true teaching, they'll attain knowledge of past lives for 60,000, 60,000 or 80,000 eons, or become a wheel-turning king, Indra, the Pure Light God, Brahmā, and so forth.

source_sentence: 能不壞正信，不墮諸惡趣，不生阿修羅，無刀杖鬪諍，又復遠離愚癡得大智慧，
translation: They will not break the true faith, they won’t fall into bad destinies, won’t be born as a titan, won’t fight with swords or sticks, and also will be free of folly and attain great wisdom.

source_sentence: 相好端嚴，猶如諸佛，一一色相等無有異，不為眷屬癡惱所纏，常離病苦，
translation: Their marks and embellishments are just like those of buddhas. Each distinctive characteristic is equal, without any difference. They are not tethered by the afflictions of their followers, and they are always free from the suffering of illness.

source_sentence: 常得天眼，不為那誐，不生瞋恚，又常遠離一切貧窶，為銅輪王受大快樂，
translation: They always attain divine vision and do not become angry or hostile. They are always free of all poverty, and experience great bliss as a copper wheel-turning king.

source_sentence: 諸根圓滿忍辱具足，乃至臨命終時，正念現前心不顛倒。
translation: Their faculties are perfected, their forbearance is complete, and when they reach the end of their life, right mindfulness is manifested, their minds aren't mistaken.

source_sentence: 即時，東方有十二殑伽沙數佛面現其前，南方有二十殑伽沙數佛，西方有二十五殑伽沙數佛，
translation: Immediately, as many faces as there are twelve sands in the east appeared before him. In the south, there were as many buddhas as there are twenty sands; in the west, there were as many buddhas as there are twenty-five sands.

source_sentence: 北方有八十殑伽沙數佛，上方有九十千俱胝佛，下方有百俱胝佛，如是等諸佛皆為現前，
translation: In the northern direction there were buddhas as numerous as the grains of sand in eighty-eighty Ganges Rivers. At the top was a buddha named Sadāparibhūta, and at the bottom was a hundred buddhas. All these buddhas were manifested before him.

source_sentence: 安慰其人，咸作是言：「汝善男子！
translation: To comfort those people, they all said, You good man!

source_sentence: 勿生怖畏，汝先已能有大功德而為依怙，汝今見此百千俱胝那庾多殑伽沙數佛世尊不？」
translation: Don't become frightened, for you were previously able to rely on someone with great virtue, and now do you see these hundreds of thousands of koṭis of buddhas as numerous as the Bhagavān?

source_sentence: 彼答言：「見。」
translation: They replied, See.

source_sentence: 時諸佛言：「善男子！
translation: The buddhas then said, Good sons!

source_sentence: 此諸如來，以汝功德力故，俱來至此。」
translation: These tathāgatas have all come here because of the power of your merit.

source_sentence: 彼人復言：「我今以何善根力故，而獲如是？」
translation: Again, that person said, What is the strength of my good roots that makes me attain it now?

source_sentence: 彼諸佛言：「以汝久聞大集會正法大善根力。」
translation: The buddhas said, It's because you've long heard the great assembly of the great roots of goodness of the right teaching.

source_sentence: 彼人又言：「如我一人得聞正法，尚獲如是無量功德，何況能令盡有情界普得聞知。」』
translation: That person also said, Suppose I alone have heard the right teaching and still attain such measureless merit, so how could I cause all sentient beings in the world to hear and know it?

source_sentence: 「時，蓮華藏如來廣說彼臨命終人見諸佛已，又告我言：『善男子！
translation: At the time, the lotus-treasury tathāgata explained in detail that those people who were about to die saw the buddhas and told me again, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 若人得聞此大正法一四句偈者，與彼供養十三殑伽沙數如來、應供、正等正覺所獲福聚等無有異。
translation: If someone hears a single four-line verse of this great true teaching, they're no different from those who make offerings to the thirteen tathāgatas, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Enlightened Ones, and other merits obtained by them.

source_sentence: 又若有人得聞此大集會正法者，所有福聚，譬如遍滿三千大千世界悉置胡麻，
translation: “Furthermore, if there is anyone who hears this great assembly of the true-dharma, his accumulation of merit will be like placing all the sesame seeds that pervade the entire universe containing the trichiliocosm.

source_sentence: 是等麻量一一皆是轉輪聖王。
translation: Each of these measures of hemp is the wheel-turning sage king.

source_sentence: 假使有人，以諸珍寶各行布施如是輪王，所獲福聚，不如唯施一須陀洹；
translation: Suppose there is a person who gives all the treasures and jewels to each of these wheel-turning kings. The merit he obtains would not be as great as if he were to give only one stream entrant.

source_sentence: 若施一須陀洹，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量須陀洹；
translation: If someone were to donate one stream-winner, it would be no different from giving as many stream-winners pervading the great manifold cosmos of the 3,000 universes as before.

source_sentence: 若施如是須陀洹，不如施一斯陀含；
translation: If you give in this way to a stream-winner, it is not as good as giving one sakrdagamin.

source_sentence: 若施一斯陀含，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量斯陀含；
translation: If someone were to donate one sakrdagamin, it would not be as good as if they were to donate the same number of sakrdagamins pervading a thousand worlds throughout the manifold cosmos.

source_sentence: 若施如是斯陀含，不如施一阿那含；
translation: If you give in this way to someone who is a once-returner, it is not as good as giving one and the same anagamin.

source_sentence: 若施一阿那含，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量阿那含；
translation: If someone were to donate one ksana, it would not be as good as if they were to donate the same number of ksanas pervading a great manifold-thousand worlds like the ones mentioned above.

source_sentence: 若施如是阿那含，不如施一阿羅漢；
translation: If you give to someone like this, it is not as good as giving to an arhat.

source_sentence: 若施一阿羅漢，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量阿羅漢；
translation: If you donate to one arhat, it is not as good as if you gave to the same number of arhats pervading a great manifold-thousand worlds like the ones mentioned above.

source_sentence: 若施如是阿羅漢，不如施一緣覺；
translation: If you give to an arhat like this, it is not as good as giving to one pratyekabuddha.

source_sentence: 若施一緣覺，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量所有緣覺；
translation: If you give to one pratyekabuddha, it is not as good as giving to all the pratyekabuddhas who pervade a great manifold cosmos of 3,000 worlds like the ones mentioned above.

source_sentence: 若施如是緣覺，不如施一菩薩；
translation: If someone were to give in this way to the pratyekabuddhas, it would not be as good as giving to one bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 若施一菩薩，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量所有菩薩；
translation: If you give to one enlightening being, it is not as good as giving to all the enlightening beings who pervade the billion-world-galactic universe.

source_sentence: 若施如是菩薩，不如於一如來發淨信心布施供養；
translation: If someone gave to an enlightening being like this, they wouldn’t be able to develop pure faith in a single buddha and offer it as an offering.

source_sentence: 若於一如來信心供養，不如於彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量一切如來信心供養；
translation: If someone were to offer faith to one buddha, it would be no better to offer faith to all the buddhas in as many worlds throughout the manifold cosmos as there already are.

source_sentence: 雖於如是一切如來信心供養，不如有人於此大集會正法暫得聞持，所獲福聚倍多於彼，
translation: Even so, it is not as good as if someone were to hear and retain the true-dharma of this great assembly for a short time in order to make offerings with faith to all these buddhas. That person’s merit would be even greater than theirs.

source_sentence: 何況更能書寫讀誦，如是功德不可稱計。』
translation: How could he be able to write, read, and recite such merits that they can't be measured?'

source_sentence: 「是時，彼佛又告我言：『善男子！
translation: At the time, that Buddha again addressed me, saying, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 汝可於此正法，發淨信心，宣揚流布。
translation: You should give rise to pure faith in this true teaching and spread it.

source_sentence: 諸凡夫類於此正法，不能得聞，設有聞者生疑不信，如何能入此大法聚？
translation: Ordinary people can't hear this right teaching, but if they hear it and have doubts and don't believe it, how can they enter this great collection of teachings?

source_sentence: 譬如有人入於大海，而欲盡見其水邊際，汝謂是人而能見不？』
translation: Suppose there's a person who enters the ocean and wants to see all the edges of the water, do you say that person can see them?'

source_sentence: 我即答言：『不也。
translation: I answered, 'No.'

source_sentence: 世尊！』
translation: Bhagavān!'

source_sentence: 『又如有人臨於大海，以手勺水欲盡枯涸。
translation: 'Furthermore, suppose there's a person facing the ocean and wants to dry up with a handful of water.

source_sentence: 汝謂是人而能成不？』
translation: Do you think this person will be able to accomplish it?'

source_sentence: 我復答言：『不也。
translation: Again, I replied, 'No.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是等愚人，雖於海水欲知邊際、欲盡枯涸，終不能就，徒自疲勞，深為大失。』
translation: Even though these foolish people want to know the limits of the water and want it to dry up, they can't get there; they simply tire themselves and are deeply lost.'

source_sentence: 時彼佛言：『諸凡夫類亦復如是，於此正法不能聽受，於生死海妄生顛倒增長愚癡，
translation: The Buddha then said: So it is with the ordinary people. They cannot hear and accept this true doctrine, and in the sea of birth and death they give rise to delusion and increase ignorance.

source_sentence: 深為太失。
translation: It's deeply mistaken.

source_sentence: 是人雖經百千俱胝那庾多如來、應供、正等正覺出現於世，不種善根，
translation: Even though hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Enlightened Ones appeared in the world, they did not plant roots of goodness.

source_sentence: 不得見佛，不聞是法，不為諸佛之所護念。
translation: They can't see the Buddha, hear this teaching, or be protected by the buddhas.

source_sentence: 若有智者，能於百千俱胝那庾多佛所發淨信心，見彼諸佛生大歡喜，乃從諸佛得聞是法，
translation: If there are wise people, they can develop pure faith in the hundreds of thousands of myriadstical koṭis of buddhas. Seeing those buddhas and being greatly joyful, they hear this Dharma from the buddhas.

source_sentence: 聞是法已，即如實知，不生輕謗，是人得大善利，即為諸佛共所護念。
translation: Having heard this teaching, he knows it as it really is and doesn't denigrate it. That person will attain great good benefits, which are the shared protection of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 若人於此正法，能聽受書寫一四句偈者，是人當生過九十五千俱胝佛剎已，
translation: If someone were to hear and accept a single four-line verse composed for this true doctrine, that person would be reborn in more than ninety-five-five thousand buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 得生極樂世界見佛聞法，壽命八萬四千劫。』
translation: They'll be born in the paradise world and see the Buddha and hear the Dharma, with a life span of 84,000 eons.'

source_sentence: 「彼蓮華藏佛復告我言：『若人於五逆罪，或自所作，或教他作，或見聞隨喜，
translation: Again, the buddha Padmasaṃbhava Buddha said to me, “If a person commits one of the five grave sins or does so for himself, or if he teaches others to do so, or if they are delighted by what they see and hear,

source_sentence: 是人當受五無間苦；
translation: That person will experience five kinds of unremitting suffering:

source_sentence: 若有得聞此大集會正法一四句偈，即得銷滅如是等業。』
translation: If someone can hear this one four-line verse of the great assembly of the right teaching, they'll be able to extinguish such actions.'

source_sentence: 「『汝今聽我說，　　聞此經功德，
translation: 'Now, listen to me as I explain the merit of hearing this sūtra.

source_sentence: 往劫有一人，　　具造五種業，
translation: In the past kalpa, there was a man who did five kinds of actions.

source_sentence: 謂殺父害母，　　破和合僧伽，
translation: It means killing one’s father and harming his mother, Disrupting the harmonious sangha.

source_sentence: 毀菩薩三昧，　　壞如來正智。
translation: To disparage the bodhisattva's concentration destroys the Tathāgata's right wisdom.

source_sentence: 彼人作是罪，　　後即生追悔，
translation: That person commits such a sin, and then they'll immediately become remorseful.

source_sentence: 憂惱復啼泣，　　心生如是念：
translation: Again weeping and distressed, They think in their hearts:

source_sentence: 「我造眾惡業，　　非唯壞此身，
translation: “I have done many evil deeds, Not only destroying this body:

source_sentence: 後世及多劫，　　其身皆破壞。
translation: In the afterlife and many eons, their bodies will all be destroyed.

source_sentence: 從苦生於苦，　　苦受轉復深，
translation: Suffering arises from suffering, and the feeling of suffering becomes deeper.

source_sentence: 遠離眾善友，　　為世所輕誚。
translation: Being far removed from all good friends, he's despised by the world.

source_sentence: 世出世間法，　　我悉皆已焚，
translation: Worldly and supramundane dharmas, I have burned them all.

source_sentence: 無量劫善因，　　破壞不增長。
translation: Measureless eons of good causes are destroyed and don't grow.

source_sentence: 如世間舍宇，　　眾彩所莊嚴，
translation: It’s like a house in the world, Adorned with various colors.

source_sentence: 而忽為火焚，　　人皆絕愛樂。
translation: Suddenly they are burned by fire, and all the people give up their cravings.

source_sentence: 我作罪亦然，　　此世與他世，
translation: So it is with the sin of self-causation: this world and other worlds.

source_sentence: 為業火所焚，　　自他非愛樂。
translation: They are burned by the fire of karma, not loved by themselves or others.

source_sentence: 在在世所生，　　人譏罵捶打，
translation: When they are born in the world, people ridicule and beat them.

source_sentence: 常貧困飢渴，　　苦惱眾所侵。
translation: They're always poor, hungry, and thirsty, and they're attacked by the many who suffer.

source_sentence: 如是等報應，　　非別因所感，
translation: Such retributions and responses are not produced by any other cause.

source_sentence: 皆從五業生，　　不善果無失。
translation: They all arise from five actions, and there's no loss of unwholesome results.

source_sentence: 我今苦既然，　　誰為救護者？
translation: Now that I am suffering, Who will rescue me?

source_sentence: 親友力不能，　　一切無依止。」
translation: The strength of my friends and relatives can't, and everything has no support.

source_sentence: 復作是思惟：　　「我不如今時，
translation: Again, he thought: At the present time I am not...

source_sentence: 往彼高山頂，　　墜身終此命。
translation: Going to the top of that high mountain, he fell down and died here.

source_sentence: 免增長惡業，　　轉生於苦惱，
translation: To avoid the growth of bad karma, they are born in suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 此世及他世，　　為惡業所壞。
translation: This world and other worlds will be destroyed by bad actions.

source_sentence: 內既無依怙，　　身外亦復然，
translation: Since there’s no support inside, So it is also outside the body.

source_sentence: 現為過失因，　　當受極惡報。」
translation: Now, as a result of their faults, they'll experience the most bad retribution.

source_sentence: 彼作是念已，　　而復自啼泣。
translation: After they think this, They again weep and wail.

source_sentence: 即時虛空中，　　有天人告言：
translation: Immediately, in space, there are gods and humans who tell them,

source_sentence: 「悲哉！汝愚癡，　　心生諸苦惱，
translation: “What a pity that you are ignorant And give rise to afflictions in your minds!

source_sentence: 無歸復無救，　　汝自作五業，
translation: There’s no refuge and no savior. You yourself have done five actions:

source_sentence: 殺父害母等，　　苦惱今自受，
translation: Killing one’s father and killing his mother, etc., is now a form of self-inflicted suffering.

source_sentence: 何故作是思，　　欲高山殞命？
translation: Why do you think this, wanting to die on a high mountain?

source_sentence: 我今勸於汝，　　勿起愚癡見，
translation: I now urge you not to give rise to the view of folly.

source_sentence: 但生悔過心，　　何須損身命！
translation: They simply give rise to remorse, Why would they need to harm their bodies and lives?

source_sentence: 貪瞋癡三毒，　　從汝心所生，
translation: The three poisons of greed, hatred, and delusion arise from your mind.

source_sentence: 惡趣中苦惱，　　無由得免離。
translation: There's no way to escape suffering and distress in the bad destinies.

source_sentence: 雖欲絕身命，　　不得名精進，
translation: Even though they want to cut off body and life, they can't call it effort.

source_sentence: 此處命速盡，　　後惡報速生。
translation: In this place, life quickly ends and the subsequent bad retribution quickly arises.

source_sentence: 汝今聽我言，　　為汝設方便，
translation: Listen to my words now, and I will devise an expedient means for you.

source_sentence: 佛菩薩聖道，　　汝未能趣向。
translation: Noble paths of buddhas and bodhisattvas, you can't aspire to them.

source_sentence: 今可往一山，　　仙人修行處，
translation: Now, you may go to a mountain where the holy ones practice.

source_sentence: 汝當親敬禮，　　彼能為救護。
translation: You should pay your respects to them, for they can rescue and protect you.

source_sentence: 有最勝方便，　　謂上妙正法，
translation: The supreme skillful means is the supremely sublime true teaching.

source_sentence: 能離諸怖畏，　　銷除極惡業。」
translation: They'll be freed from all fears and remove the most bad actions.

source_sentence: 彼人於是時，　　聞空中言已，
translation: At that moment, having heard the words spoken in the sky,

source_sentence: 即詣於山中，　　仙人修行處。
translation: He then went to the mountain, where the sage was practicing.

source_sentence: 到已見一仙，　　即時頭面禮，
translation: On arriving, he saw the holy one. He bowed his head and face at once.

source_sentence: 合掌白是言：　　「願仙救護我，
translation: He joined his palms and said, May the holy man save me!

source_sentence: 我怖畏苦惱，　　造極重五業，
translation: I am afraid of suffering and distress, committing the most serious of the five actions.

source_sentence: 必墮於惡趣。　　云何得免離？
translation: They will surely fall into evil rebirths, so how can they escape?

source_sentence: 我於晝夜中，　　飲食及坐臥，
translation: During the day and night, I eat, drink, sit, and lay down.

source_sentence: 常憂生苦惱，　　暫時無少樂。
translation: Constant grief produces suffering and distress, and there's little pleasure for a while.

source_sentence: 我今於仙人，　　生信心尊重，
translation: I now give rise to faith and respect for the holy ones.

source_sentence: 如我所問者，　　願仙為我說。
translation: As I've asked, may the sage explain it for me.

source_sentence: 我造眾惡業，　　如何得銷滅？」
translation: How can I destroy all bad actions that I've done?

source_sentence: 時彼仙答言：　　「汝問我當說。」
translation: The sage then replied, You asked me to explain it.

source_sentence: 是時彼仙人，　　食已濯手足，
translation: The holy man then, having eaten the food, Washed his hands and feet.

source_sentence: 即跏趺而坐，　　聽彼親自首。
translation: He then sat cross-legged and listened to his own leader.

source_sentence: 彼人時右繞，　　禮仙而退坐，
translation: The man then circumambulated to his right, saluted the sage, withdrew, and sat down.

source_sentence: 白言我愚癡，　　殺父及害母。
translation: They say, 'I'm foolish, killing my father and harming my mother.'

source_sentence: 破和合僧伽，　　毀菩薩三昧，
translation: breaks the harmonious saṃgha, disparages the bodhisattva's concentration,

source_sentence: 壞如來正智，　　造此五種業。
translation: Disrupting the Tathāgata's right knowledge, they create these five kinds of actions.

source_sentence: 彼仙聞是說，　　即時而謂言：
translation: When that sage heard this teaching, he immediately said,

source_sentence: 「汝實不善人，　　作如此等罪。」
translation: You're really an unwholesome person who committed such a sin.

source_sentence: 彼人聞仙言，　　又復生憂惱，
translation: Those people who heard the holy man’s words Again became grieved and distressed.

source_sentence: 恐畏無所救，　　必當墮惡趣。
translation: I'm afraid there's nothing to save, and I'll surely fall into a bad destiny.

source_sentence: 是時從座起，　　禮彼仙人足，
translation: He then rose from his seat, bowed at the feet of that holy man, and said to him:

source_sentence: 轉復生恭敬，　　作如是白言：
translation: Again, with respect and veneration, they said these words:

source_sentence: 「仙人悲念我，　　極重惡業者，
translation: The holy man had compassion for me because of my extremely grave evil deeds

source_sentence: 疑惑苦惱深，　　唯願作依怙。
translation: My doubts and confusions are deep and painful, but I only wish to be their refuge.

source_sentence: 我雖如是悔，　　無出離方便，
translation: Even though I repent in this way, there’s no method of liberation.

source_sentence: 仙人大慈悲，　　令我罪銷滅。」
translation: The great sage is compassionate and causes my sins to be extinguished.

source_sentence: 仙聞是說已，　　安慰彼人言：
translation: After hearing this teaching, the sage comforted those people and said,

source_sentence: 「汝今勿怖畏，　　我能為救護，
translation: Don’t be afraid, for I can rescue you.

source_sentence: 一心開導汝，　　令汝離眾苦，
translation: Enlighten you with one mind, And cause you to be freed from all suffering.

source_sentence: 得重罪銷滅，　　我即是所歸。
translation: Attaining the extinction of serious sins is where I take refuge.

source_sentence: 佛有妙法門，　　名為大集會，
translation: The Buddha has a wonderful dharma-gate called the Great Assembly.

source_sentence: 是最上方便，　　汝昔曾聞不？」
translation: This is the supreme method, have you ever heard it before?

source_sentence: 彼人答仙言：　　「我昔未曾聞。」
translation: That person answered the sage, I've never heard it before.

source_sentence: 仙人復告言：　　「哀哉罪業者，
translation: Again, the holy man said, “O sinners!

source_sentence: 如人火已焚，　　誰當為說法？
translation: It's like a person whose fire has burned them, so who will teach the Dharma?

source_sentence: 我今以悲心，　　示汝微妙法，
translation: Now, with compassion, I will show you the subtle Dharma.

source_sentence: 汝今當善聽。　　我念往昔時，
translation: Listen attentively. I remember that in the past,

source_sentence: 過無量無邊，　　阿僧祇數劫。
translation: It's beyond measureless, limitless, and incalculable eons.

source_sentence: 時有一囉惹，　　無垢月為名，
translation: At that time there was a rāja called the undefiled moon.

source_sentence: 眷屬甚熾盛，　　以正法治世。
translation: Their retinues are so numerous that they rule the world correctly.

source_sentence: 囉惹於一時，　　而生育一子，
translation: Rāṣṭrapāla once had a son,

source_sentence: 即令召相師，　　觀彼善惡相。
translation: He then ordered the master of call signs to observe their good and bad characteristics.

source_sentence: 乃問相師言：　　『今我此一子，
translation: Then he asked the soothsayer, saying:

source_sentence: 為善為惡相，　　汝觀當云何？』
translation: What will you observe for good and bad characteristics?'

source_sentence: 相師前白言：　　『怪哉此一子！
translation: The master of characteristics went before him and said, 'How strange this one child!

source_sentence: 如我所觀者，　　其相極不善！』
translation: As I observe them, their characteristics are extremely unwholesome!'

source_sentence: 囉惹復謂言：　　『不善相云何？
translation: Rāja also said, 'What are the characteristics of unwholesomeness?'

source_sentence: 如汝所觀相，　　諦實為我說。』
translation: As you observe characteristics, the truth is really explained for me.'

source_sentence: 相師作是白：　　『此子至七歲，
translation: The soothsayers said, “This child will reach the age of seven.

source_sentence: 當起癡害心，　　斷於父母命。』
translation: You must give rise to the mind of delusion and harmfulness and cut off your parents' lives.'

source_sentence: 囉惹復告言：　　『其相雖如是，
translation: Rāṣṭrapāla again said, 'Although it looks like this,

source_sentence: 寧棄我身命，　　此子終不壞，
translation: Why would you abandon my body and life? This child will never perish.

source_sentence: 我若棄是者，　　當不復人趣。』
translation: If I abandon this, I won't go back to the human destinies.'

source_sentence: 即令諸眷屬，　　善養育我子，
translation: That will cause the members of my retinue To give good nourishment to my children.

source_sentence: 其後彼童子，　　不久漸長大。
translation: Soon after that, the boy grew up gradually.

source_sentence: 是時無垢月，　　憶彼相師言，
translation: The Licchavi Vimalakīrti then remembered what the soothsayer had said:

source_sentence: 即生如是念：　　『今我業恐至，
translation: Then he had this thought: I am afraid that my karma will come to an end.

source_sentence: 有何所悋惜！』　　既作是念已，
translation: What is to be cherished?” Having thought thus, the brahman’s body was like this:

source_sentence: 乃勅令童子，　　汝今繼我位。
translation: I've ordered the boy to follow me as your successor.

source_sentence: 復謂童子言：　　『汝今當諦聽，
